content:
Before clicking "Copy from stream": pasted image
After clicking: pasted image
When you click the "Copy from stream" button, the triangle doesn't change to facing downwards. It's a small change, but I think it's useful.
Animation might be a bit difficult, direct switch is a bit sudden, so might as well be changed to a downward-facing caret for both states like we do with the user docs chevrons
this whole widget is going away. waiting on merging the compose pills (which are hung up on something related to mirror realms?), then we'll use those here as well :). But otherwise agreed.
